data.title: pyDIA: Star detection, difference imaging, and photometry
data.name: pyDIA
data.description: pyDIA is a modular python package for performing star detection, difference imaging and photometry on astronomical images.

evidence: "pyDIA is a modular python package for performing star detection, difference imaging and photometry on astronomical images." (indicates a reusable Python package, i.e., a dependency library)
The description focuses on performing domain-specific astronomical image analysis ("star detection, difference imaging and photometry"), which directly contributes to scientific results.
README only shows project name and citation badge, implying distribution via the code repository itself without mention of package managers or binaries.
